Interface Boundary

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Boundary_Grid
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Boundary_Grid_NetCDF, Boundary_Grid_TestingGrid

    public interface Boundary
    Reads depth values from a data source
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool

    • Method Summary

      Clones the BathymetryReader object

      Given x and y locations return a depth at that location
      double getPreciseBoundaryDepth(double x, double y)
      Given x and y locations, return the depth at that location taking into account intracell change.
